2020.title: Mobile I-Lab
2020.description: I-Lab is a mobile laboratory fully equipped for large scale testing and detection of infectious diseases using RT PCR, Rapid Antigen and ELISA testing kits.

2020.title: iGenomics
2020.description: iGenomics is the first comprehensive mobile genome analysis application, with capabilities to align reads, call variants, and visualize the results entirely on an iOS device.

2020.title: TriSilix
2020.description: TriSilix is a micro laboratory' which performs a miniature version of the polymerase chain reaction (PCR) on the spot.

2020.title: CARMEN
2020.description: Combinatorial Arrayed Reactions for Multiplexed Evaluation of Nucleic acids (CARMEN) flexibly scales up CRISPR-based molecular diagnostics, using microfluidics chips that can run thousands of tests simultaneously.

2020.title: Xenobots
2020.description: Xenobots are synthetic lifeforms that are designed by computers to perform some desired function.
